placeholders.Subtitle: From concept to launch in 6 weeks

placeholders.Title: Agenda
placeholders.Body[0]:
- Vision and goals
- Users and use cases
- Architecture overview
- Prototype demo
- Metrics & timeline
placeholders.Body[1]:
- Risks & mitigations
- Team & roles
- Budget overview
- Q&A

placeholders.Title: Vision
placeholders.Body: Deliver self-serve analytics to 3,000+ internal users with sub-2s query latency and governed data access.

placeholders.Title: Key Personas
placeholders.Body[0]:
**Analyst**
- Ad-hoc exploration
- SQL power-user
- Needs versioned datasets
placeholders.Body[1]:
**Manager**
- Weekly KPIs
- Email/PDF exports
- SLA: 9 am Monday

placeholders.Title: North Star Metrics
placeholders.Body:
- Weekly Active Users (WAU)
- Median query latency (s)
- Dashboard share rate (%)
- Data freshness (hrs)

placeholders.Title: High-Level Architecture
placeholders.Body:
- Ingest: CDC + batch (Kafka, Airflow)
- Lakehouse: Parquet + Delta
- Query: DuckDB + Presto
- Serving: REST + BI
- AuthZ: OPA + Column-masking

placeholders.Title: Data Contracts Snapshot
placeholders.Body[0]:
**Orders v2**
- PII tags: none
- SLA: 15 min
- Owner: Sales Eng
placeholders.Body[1]:
**Customers v1**
- PII tags: email
- SLA: hourly
- Owner: CRM
placeholders.Body[2]:
**Events v3**
- PII tags: anon_id
- SLA: near-real-time
- Owner: Platform

placeholders.Title: Risks & Mitigations
placeholders.Body:
- Data freshness SLAs might slip → Add backfill monitors and retry budgets
- Governance gaps → Enforce policy-as-code and lineage checks in CI
- Cost overruns → Right-size clusters, auto-suspend idle, tiered storage
- Adoption lag → Champions program, office hours, template gallery

placeholders.Title: Thank You
placeholders.Body:
Contact
- Product: product@company.com
- Slack: #data-product
